amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.para: In lieu of, or in addition to, the issuance of bonds, the city council or board of trustees may issue warrants for the payment of damages, and levy taxes, if necessary, to provide funds for their payment, or may temporarily borrow any funds in the treasury belonging to any other fund, for the purpose of making the payments herein required, restoring such funds within a reasonable time.
